SETTINGS.ApplyLimitsDescription: Should Limits be applied to rolls
SETTINGS.AutomateMultiDefenseModifierDescription: Will automatically apply defense mod for multiple attacks
SETTINGS.AutomateProgressiveRecoilDescription: Characters accrue progressive recoil until reset
SETTINGS.DefaultOpposedTestActorSelectionDescript: Always overwrite selected tokens with targets used for testing
SETTINGS.DiagonalMovementDescription: How should diagonal movement be handled when using a grid
SETTINGS.DisplayDefaultRollCardDescription: Should the default roll-card be displayed along with the Shadowrun roll-card
SETTINGS.FreshColorAndIcon: Highlight with Text Color and Icon
SETTINGS.HideGMOnlyChatContent: Hide critical information on GM test
SETTINGS.HideGMOnlyChatContentDescription: GM test messages will only show all information to players that own the used actor
SETTINGS.ImportIconFolderDescription: The folder where the importer can find icon files. Default location: 'systems/shadowrun5e/dist/icons/importer/'
SETTINGS.ManualRollOnSuccessTest: Manual dice roll on any test
SETTINGS.ManualRollOnSuccessTestDescription: Allow user to manually roll dice on tests and report back hits
SETTINGS.MarkImportsDescription: Denote freshly imported items on actor sheets to highlight that they should be reviewed
SETTINGS.MustHaveRessourcesOnTestDescription: Only allow actors with all necessary resources to roll a test
SETTINGS.OnlyAllowRollOnDefaultableSkillsDescript: When unset unknown skills can be rolled, even if they can't be defaulted.
SETTINGS.OnlyAutoRollNPCInCombatDescription: When unset players must manually roll their init on each new pass / round
SETTINGS.ShowGlitchAnimationDescription: Should display the animation as part of the glitch text on the roll card
SETTINGS.ShowSkillsWithDetailsDescription: When set skill list display will mirror core rulebook style (italics, short attributes)
SETTINGS.ShowTokenNameForChatOutputDescription: Should the token name be used for roll card output instead of the actor name when available
SETTINGS.ShowTokenNameForChatOutputName: Use Token Name for Roll Card
SETTINGS.TokenHealthBarsDescription: A full damage track will show as an empty health bar on a Token instead of mirroring
SETTINGS.TokenRulerColorRunningDescription: The color for distance within running rate.
SETTINGS.TokenRulerColorSprintingDescription: The color for distance above running rate, where sprinting is necessary.
SETTINGS.TokenRulerColorWalkingDescription: The color for distance within walking rate.
SETTINGS.TokenRulerOpacityDescription: How opaque the token ruler measurements are displayed. (0 = fully transparent, 1 = fully opaque)
SETTINGS.UseDamageConditionDescription: System marks tokens according to their condition monitor
SETTINGS.UseDamageConditionName: Use system handling for token status effects
SETTINGS.UseImportIconOverridesDescription: When importing items, use the same icons for some different item types when it makes sense. Uncheck if using custom icons.

ActiveEffect.CannotAddTestViaItemToActor: Cannot add an Active Effect of type 'Test via Item' to an Actor

MIGRATION.BeginNotification: Beginning Shadowrun system migration from version
MIGRATION.DoNotCloseNotification: Please do not close your game or shut down FoundryVTT.
MIGRATION.SuccessDescription: Existing compendium packs belonging to this world have been updated in the process of this migration.
MIGRATION.SuccessNotification: Shadowrun system successfully migrated to version
MIGRATION.SuccessPacksInfo: Due to current technical limitations within FoundryVTT, actor packs must be updated manually.
MIGRATION.WarningBackup: If you have not backed up your world, do so before you press the 'Begin Migration' button below.
MIGRATION.WarningDescription: Only the GM can perform the update and shutting down the server or closing your browser while the update is in progress may cause irreparable damage to your world.
MIGRATION.WarningRequired: The Shadowrun 5E system must begin a required update.

SR5.MarkImportedItemTooltip: Marks this imported item as having been reviewed.
SR5.MarkImportsTooltip: Marks all items on this actor that were imported as having been reviewed.

MarkInvitation.AskForInvite: Asks for an mark invitation for:

SR5.MigrationUpdateCompendiumNoUpdateActor: Due to technical limitations within FoundryVTT, actor compendium packs are unable to be updated at this time. You will have to manually update these packs.
SR5.MigrationUpdateCompendiumUpdateMessage: Any world compendium packs that exist in the world were also updated

Version18_0_0.Line1: From version 0.18.0 onwards effects on owned items will directly apply without them having to be copied to the actor.
Version18_0_0.Line2: Previously copied effects must be deleted or disabled to avoid both item and actor effects applying changes. By default all effects with an item origin will be deleted.
Version18_0_0.Line3: Effects created directly on actors aren't affected.
Version18_0_0.Line4: Should you heavily use effects and effects modules and aren't sure about 'item owned effects', you set this migration to disable and review your disabled effects. Disabled effects will be marked as such.
Version18_0_0.Line5: Also be aware that enabled effects on actor items will now be applied. You'll be able to see all applied effects in the actors effects tab.

Actor.Critter: Allow the use of critter powers
Actor.DefaultCategoryVisibility: Show item categories even if no item has been added to them
Actor.Grunt: Apply grunt rules to this actor
Actor.MarkTarget: Place additional marks on this target
Actor.MatrixConnectionToggle: Change Matrix Connection status: Augmented Reality, Cold Sim, or Hot Sim
Actor.MatrixRunningSilentToggle: Change your matrix device between Running Silent and Displaying your Persona
Actor.Metatype: As NPC the metatype will also apply attribute quick modifiers
Actor.MissingSummoner: Drag&Drop Character or use summoning action
Actor.MissingTechnomancer: Drag&Drop Character or use compilation action
Actor.NPC: Mark actor as NPC to get additional features
Actor.PickControlledTokenAsDriver: Pick the currently Controlled Token Actor as the Driver
Actor.PlaceMark: Action to be used to place marks on already marked targets
Actor.RebootPersonaAndClearAllMarks: Reboot your Persona and clear all Marks you have placed
Actor.ResetActorForNewRun: Reset damage, edge, etc. for a new run
Actor.SetupPAN: Add all Equipped Wireless Devices to this character's Persona

CallInAction.ActorType: Type of actor to call in

CompilationTest.PreparedSprite: Use a prepared sprite actor instead of creating a generic one

Contact.LinkActor: Drag&Drop an actor to link him to this contact

Effect.AlterApplyToWithChanges: Remove changes before changing what the effect applies to.
Effect.ApplyTo: Changes of this effect will apply to this target only
Effect.ItemEffects: Effects collected from items on this document
Effect.OnlyAllFilteredUsed: This effect will only apply for tests matching all selections
Effect.OnlyFilteredUsed: This effect will only apply for tests matching at least one selection
Effect.OnlyForItemTest: Only affect test of parent item
Effect.OnlyForWireless: This effect will apply only for items that have wireless enabled
Effect.PriorityFieldDisabled: Custom priority is not supported at this time

Item.ActionCategories: Select action categories to use instead of the test's default categories. Using Active Effects you can use categories to modify test values
Item.ActionModifier: Select pool modifiers to use instead of test's default modifiers
Item.ActionRollMode: Default roll mode when casting this action. Will overwrite global chat setting
Item.AmmoReplaceDamage: Set to replace weapon damage instead of modifying it
Item.AvailabilityAdjustment: Adjust actual availability based on the item rating
Item.CostAdjustment: Adjust actual cost based on the item rating
Item.DisabledForPreparedActor: Disabled due to use of prepared actor

Modifiers.defense_block: Adds to the defense modifier for active blocking
Modifiers.defense_dodge: Adds to the defense modifier for active dodging
Modifiers.defense_melee: Adds to the defense modifier for melee defense
Modifiers.defense_parry: Adds to the defense modifier for active parrying
Modifiers.defense_ranged: Adds to the defense modifier for ranged attack
Modifiers.global: Modifies all tests pool, excluding damage reducing tests
Modifiers.mark_damage: Modifies the amount of damage taken per MARK done to you
Modifiers.multi_defense: Modifies defense tests pool for multiple defenses per combat turn
Modifiers.pain_tolerance_physical: Modifies damage to be ignored before first wound modifier
Modifiers.pain_tolerance_stun: Modifies damage to be ignored before first wound modifier
Modifiers.place_three_marks: Modifies the modifier to place three marks at the same time
Modifiers.place_two_marks: Modifies the modifier to place two marks at the same time
Modifiers.public_grid: Modifies the Public Grid modifier when connected to it
Modifiers.run: Modifies running distance by multiples of the agility attribute
Modifiers.soak: Modifies physical damage resist tests pool
Modifiers.walk: Modifies walking distance by multiples of the agility attribute

RangedAttack.RecoilCompensation: Total RC, including actor and item RC

Ritual.ReagentDrams: Drams of reagents used for altering drain

SummoningTest.PreparedSpirit: Use a prepared spirit actor instead of creating a generic one
SummoningTest.ReagentDrams: Drams of reagents used for altering summoning limit

Test.Extended: Test will be thrown as an extended test until threshold is reached
Test.ManualGlitches: Amount of glitches from manually thrown dice pool. Must be used together with manual hits.
Test.ManualHits: Amount of hits from manually thrown dice pool. Will skip FoundryVTT dice throw.
Test.Modifier: Sum of all modifiers applied to dice pool
Test.PushTheLimit: Apply push the limit edge rules

CharacterImport.Description: This Tour will give you an overview how to import a chummer character. For details look into https://github.com/SR5-FoundryVTT/SR5-FoundryVTT/wiki/Chummer-Character-Import
CharacterImport.GeneralContent: To import a character you need the export json from chummer 5e.
CharacterImport.Title: Character Import

ConditionMonitor.ApplyDamageContent: To apply damage left click a cell. All cells up to this cell including will be filled. If more cells where filled all cells to the right will not be filled anymore. Right clicking any cell will remove all damage from the monitor.
ConditionMonitor.Description: This tour will give you an overview how the condition monitor work.
ConditionMonitor.GeneralContent: These are your conditions monitors. They consist of several cells. In certain cells you can see a written number. If these cells are filled your wound modifier is increased to this number. The wound modifiers of all monitors are added
ConditionMonitor.RecoveryContent: Clicking on the label of a condition monitor will prompt an extended recovery test. The result of the recovery test will be automatically applied to the monitor.
ConditionMonitor.Title: Condition Monitor Tour
ConditionMonitor.WoundModifierContent: This cell denotes that filling it increases your wound modifier by the number written in the cell

SR5.UseEdgeForInitiativeRoll: Use edge rule blitz for initiative

Vehicle.MissingDriver: Drag&Drop an actor or Pick a token as a driver

VehicleImport.MissingPermission: You are missing the permission to create actors

Warnings.AlreadyExistingInventory: An inventory with this name already exists
Warnings.BulkImportPerformanceWarning: If you imported a large number of items, Foundry may run slowly until you refresh your browser. It is recommended to refresh now.
Warnings.CantEditDefaultInventory: The default inventory can't be renamed
Warnings.CantExtendTestFurther: Test can't be extended either by dice left or threshold reached
Warnings.CantRecoverPhysicalWithStunDamage: Cant recover from physical damage with stun damage still present
Warnings.CantReloadFullyDueToAmmo: You didn't have enough ammo to fully reload!
Warnings.CantReloadPartialDueToAmmo: You didn't have enough ammo for a complex reload action!
Warnings.CantSecondChanceAGlitch: Can't second chance this test. Test result is glitched.
Warnings.CantSecondChanceWithoutNoneHits: Can't second chance this test. Only hit-dice left.
Warnings.CantSpendMulitplePointsOfEdge: Can't spend multiple points of edge on one test or action
Warnings.CompilationNotConcluded: Compilation incomplete. Wait for sprite to oppose compilation to determine fade.
Warnings.EdgeRulesCantBeAppliedOnTestsWithoutAnAc: Edge points can't be spent on tests without actors
Warnings.HostItemOnlyAcceptIC: Only IC actors can be added to hosts
Warnings.InvalidCompilationLevel: Resonance attribute to low for this sprite level
Warnings.InvalidMarksCount: You've trying to place a strange number of marks
Warnings.InvalidSummoningForce: Force value chosen doesn't adhere to the rules
Warnings.NoFireModeConfigured: Ranged weapon has no firemode configured. Will use single shot.
Warnings.OnlyGMCanDoThis: Only a GM user can do this
Warnings.RitualInvalidForce: Ritual force is invalid or greater then your lodges rating.
Warnings.RitualNotConcluded: Ritual incomplete. Wait for ritual to oppose spellcasting to determine drain.
Warnings.SkillCantBeDefault: This skill can't be rolled as it can't be defaulted
Warnings.SummoningNotConcluded: Summoning incomplete. Wait for spirit to oppose summoning to determine drain.
Warnings.TokenSelectionNeeded: One or more tokens need to be selected
